p: Any subject responding to the definition of suspected case was notified to SERESMI within 24 hours and samples sent to the Regional Reference Laboratory. In Anzio, a door-to-door active case finding was implemented in the houses and apartments located inside a 200m radius from a probable or confirmed case. Any subject reporting fever and joint pain during the previous 5 months was notified as suspected case and tested. We collected data on patients’ age, sex, place of living, time of symptoms’ onset, history of travel within Italy or abroad during the 15 days before symptoms’ onset. Daily situational reports (epidemic curves, geolocalization) were provided to the MoH and the National Blood Center in order to promptly implement the related control measures.
